shootergame.interactor

Class Ladder

  • java.lang.Object
    • city.cs.engine.Body
      • city.cs.engine.StaticBody
        • shootergame.interactor.Ladder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    city.cs.engine.SensorListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class Ladder
extends city.cs.engine.StaticBody
implements city.cs.engine.SensorListener
    An interactive prop that the player can climb. A ladder.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ladder(city.cs.engine.World world, Player player, org.jbox2d.common.Vec2 position)
      Constructor for ladder.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void beginContact(city.cs.engine.SensorEvent e)
      When the Player comes into contact with the ladder sensors the player can then use the E key to scale up the ladder.
      void endContact(city.cs.engine.SensorEvent e)
      When the Player loses contact with the ladder sensors the player can no longer use the E key to scale up the ladder.
      city.cs.engine.Sensor getSensor()
